data.caption: Submission Of Audited Financial Results For Quarter And Financial Year Ended March 31, 2022
data.news_body: Pursuant to the provisions of the Listing Regulations, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on 08.06.2023 (commenced at 6:00 P.M. and concluded at 11:45 P.M.) has, inter-alia, transacted the following businesses:1. Approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the Quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022, in the format prescribed under Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations, 2015, together with Auditors'' Reports of the Statutory Auditors. The copies of the same are enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Submission Of Unaudited Financial Results For Quarter Ended June 30, 2021
data.news_body: Pursuant to the provisions of the Listing Regulations, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on 08.06.2023 (commenced at 06:00 P.M. and concluded at 11:45 P.M.) has, inter-alia approved the Un-audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the Quarter ended on 30.06.2021 along with Limited Review Report thereon, pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and the same is enclosed herewith for your records.

data.caption: Results-Delay in Financial Results
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI circular no. CIR/CFD/CMD-1/142/2018 dated 19.11.2018, This is to further inform you that the Financial Results of the Company for quarter/year ending 31.03.2023 could not be finalized on time due to sealing of Sonepat unit by Municipal Corporation of Sonepat due to non- payment of property tax. The new Board of Directors duly appointed by Hon'ble National Company Law Tribunal, Principal Bench, New Delhi vide order dated 06.12.2022 have taken charge of the company affairs w.e.f. 09.12.2022 and has issued directions to the finance team for finalising the pending financial results of the company at the earliest possible. As soon as, the financial results duly approved by Board of Directors are ready, the same will be intimated to the stock exchanges.

data.caption: Submission Of Audited Financial Results For Quarter And Financial Year Ended March 31, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the provisions of the Listing Regulations, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on today i.e. 24.05.2023 (commenced at 1:30 P.M. and concluded at 10:25 P.M.) has, inter-alia, transacted the following businesses:
1. Approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the Quarter and year ended March 31, 2021 duly approved by the Board of Directors of the Company, in the format prescribed under Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations, 2015, together with Auditors''
Reports of the Statutory Auditors. The copies of the same are enclosed herewith.
2. Due to poor performance in F.Y 2020-21, no Dividend has been declared.

data.caption: Results-Delay in Financial Results
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI circular no. CIR/CFD/CMD-1/142/2018 dated 19.11.2018, This is to further inform you that the Financial Results of the Company for quarter ending 31.12.2022 could not be finalized on time, due to sealing of Sonepat unit by Municipal Corporation of Sonepat due to non- payment of property tax. The new Board of Directors duly appointed by Hon'ble National Company Law Tribunal, Principal Bench, New Delhi vide order dated 06.12.2022 have taken charge of the company affairs w.e.f. 09.12.2022 and has issued directions to the finance team for finalising the pending financial results of the company at the earliest possible. As soon as, the financial results duly approved by Board of Directors are ready, the same will be intimated to the stock exchanges.

data.caption: Results-Delay in Financial Results
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI circular no. CIR/CFD/CMD-1/142/2018 dated 19.11.2018, This is to further inform you that the Financial Results of the Company for quarter ending 30.09.2022 could not be finalized on time due to non-cooperation by one unit of the Company, under the day to day control of management committee of Sonepat unit and sealing of Sonepat unit by Municipal Corporation of Sonepat due to non- payment of property tax. The Board has given suitable directions to the finance head & Management Committee of the unit concerned for doing the needful without any further delay. The Board has also filed an interim application before NCLT, Principal Bench, Delhi in the pending company petition bearing no. CP 18/2015. You are requested not to initiate any adverse action against the Company.

data.caption: Results-Delay in Financial Results
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI circular no. CIR/CFD/CMD-1/142/2018 dated 19.11.2018, This is to further inform youthat the Financial Results of the Company for quarter ending 30.06.2022 could not be finalized on timedue to non-cooperation by one unit of the Company, under the day to day control of managementcommittee of Sonepat unit and sealing of Sonepat unit by Municipal Corporation of Sonepat due to nonpaymentof property tax. The Board has given suitable directions to the finance head & ManagementCommittee of the unit concerned for doing the needful without any further delay. The Board has alsofiled an interim application before NCLT, Principal Bench, Delhi in the pending company petition bearingno. CP 18/2015.You are requested not to initiate any adverse action against the Company.Kindly take this information on your record and oblige.

data.caption: Results-Delay in Financial Results
data.news_body: Further to our intimation dated 16.06.2021, pursuant to SEBI circular no. CIR/CFD/CMD-1/142/2018 dated 19.11.2018, In continuation to our intimation dated March 04, 2021 and April 01, 2021, This is to further inform you that the Financial Results of the Company for quarter/year ending 31.03.2021 could not be finalized on time due to non-cooperation by one unit of the Company, under the day to day control of management committee of Sonepat unit.Now the Hon'ble National Company Law Tribunal, Principal Bench, New Delhi vide its order dated June 11, 2021 has given suitable directions to the Promoters' Group and the Board of Directors of the Company for finalization of all pending financial results of the Company. Accordingly, the company is in the process of preparation of financial results in compliance with order of Hon'ble National Company Law Tribunal. The next date of hearing is fixed by the Hon'ble Tribunal for 05th July 2021 to review the progress.

data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements), 2015, please find enclosed disclosure of related party transactions on consolidated basis and balances for the half year ended March 31, 2020.

Kindly take the same in your records and oblige.

data.caption: Financial Results -31.03.2020
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed herewith revised financial results for quarter/year ended 31.03.2020. In the earlier uploaded results dated 12.02.2021, a particular column in the financial results was skipped out unintentionally and company after finding out the same submitting the revised results on suo moto basis.

Inconvenience caused is deeply regretted.

data.caption: Results-Delay in Financial Results
data.news_body:
Further to our intimation dated 16.06.2021, pursuant to SEBI circular no. CIR/CFD/CMD-1/142/2018 dated 19.11.2018, In continuation to our intimation dated March 04, 2021 and April 01, 2021, This is to further inform you that the Financial Results of the Company for quarter/year ending 31.03.2021 could not be finalized on time due to non-cooperation by one unit of the Company, under the day to day control of management committee of Sonepat unit.

Now the Hon'ble National Company Law Tribunal, Principal Bench, New Delhi vide its order dated June 11, 2021 has given suitable directions to the Promoters' Group and the Board of Directors of the Company for finalization of all pending financial results of the Company.

Accordingly, the company is in the process of preparation of financial results in compliance with order of Hon'ble National Company Law Tribunal. The next date of hearing is fixed by the Hon'ble Tribunal for 05th July 2021 to review the progress.
